WorkItem.ClosedComment: The issue is gone as the static members are gone!
WorkItem.Description: The first initialization of the CSISet class populates static dictionaries. When multiple QRCodes are generated by different threads (I created an HTTP handler generating QRCode images) and the CSISet class is still not initialized, an exception is sometimes raised in AppendECI method stating that a key is already present in the dictionary.

Comments.Message: I will change a bit for thread safe.
